project.description: This project used to publish openeuler website

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" IMAGE_VERSION="v0.0.1"
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u ap-southeast-1@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit fi cd $WORKSPACE
if [ -d "./docs" ] then rm -rf ./docs fi
git clone https://gitee.com/openeuler/docs
cd ./docs
mkdir -p ../server/web-ui/docs/zh mkdir -p ../server/web-ui/docs/en cp -r ../web-ui/docs/zh/blog ../server/web-ui/docs/zh cp -r ../web-ui/docs/en/blog ../server/web-ui/docs/en cp -r ../web-ui/docs/zh/news ../server/web-ui/docs/zh cp -r ../web-ui/docs/en/news ../server/web-ui/docs/en
#mkdir -p ../server/web-ui/docs/zh #mkdir -p ../server/web-ui/docs/en
#cp -r ../web-ui/docs/zh/* ../server/web-ui/docs/zh/ #cp -r ../web-ui/docs/en/* ../server/web-ui/docs/en/
for r in $(git branch -r --list "origin/stable2-*") do b=${r##*origin/stable2-} git checkout -b $b $r
mkdir -p ../web-ui/docs/zh/docs/$b cp -r ./docs/zh/docs/$b/* ../web-ui/docs/zh/docs/$b/
mkdir -p ../web-ui/docs/en/docs/$b cp -r ./docs/en/docs/$b/* ../web-ui/docs/en/docs/$b/
mkdir -p ../server/docs/$b/zh/ cp -r ./docs/zh/docs/$b/* ../server/docs/$b/zh/
mkdir -p ../server/docs/$b/en/ cp -r ./docs/en/docs/$b/* ../server/docs/$b/en/
cd ..
cd ./docs
done
cd .. rm -rf ./docs
echo "building backend server" cd $WORKSPACE/server docker build -t swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-backend:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-backend:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-backend:$IMAGE_VERSION
#echo "building frontend server" #cd $WORKSPACE/web-ui #docker build -t swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-frontend:$IMAGE_VERSION . #docker push swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-frontend:$IMAGE_VERSION #docker rmi swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-frontend:$IMAGE_VERSION
if [ -d "infra-openeuler" ]; then rm -rf "infra-openeuler" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-openeuler cd infra-openeuler/applications/openeuler-website-v2 else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-backend=swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-backend:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-frontend=swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler-website-frontend:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update image to $IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
